testcase.classname: This feature file is to validate the payment functionalities of Cyclos Website.
testcase.name: Validate whether payment is being made to any existing user is successful.
testcase.system-out: Given Required website is launches also the business user is able to loggin with the authorized credentials.passed When Below are the payment details like payee and amount....................passed Then System is able to make the payments to desired user with specified amount.passed

testcase.classname: This feature file is to validate the payment functionalities of Cyclos Website.
testcase.name: Validate whether payment is being made to existing user is successful through ScnOutline
testcase.system-out: Given Website launched after that business user is able to loggin with the authorized credentials.passed When Data details are User "Nicola Tesla" Amount "2" system is able to make the payment..passed Then System is able to make the required payment to the users...............passed

testcase.classname: This feature file is to validate the payment functionalities of Cyclos Website.
testcase.name: Validate whether payment is being made to existing user is successful by fetching data from external csv file
testcase.system-out: Given Launching the Cyclos website after that using the account id with passowrd to gain access to proceed further.passed When Data is being fetched from "./TestData/CyclosNew.csv"..................passed Then Payment is being made by the system....................................passed
